title: Chicken People
description:
If you've ever watched "Best In Show," replace the dogs with chickens and you end up with "Chicken People"! That's the doc Tig and Cheryl are cluckin' about on today's very Ohio episode of True Story! Tig and Cheryl also take a moment at the top of the episode to talk about events outside the usual scope of the podcast. *this episode spills beans* Get merch at podswag.com/truestory (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
